richardson.joshua.discount.code

Class Rules

  • java.lang.Object
    • richardson.joshua.discount.code.Rules

  • public class Rules
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create the rules for the discounts. This means that the values could be changed if desired numForDiscount represents the number of items you have to buy to get a discount price is the price that the items cost when not discounted discount is the combined price you pay for the number of items defined
